animeTitle: Arashi no Yoru ni: Himitsu no Tomodachi (Dub)
otherNames: On a Stormy Night: Secret Friends, One Stormy Night, あらしのよるに ひみつのともだち
synopsis: A new anime adaptation by Sparky Animation, Duckbill Entertainment, Baku Enterprise and Bandai Visual of the book Arashi no Yoru ni (One Stormy Night...) by Kimura Yuuichi.
